Upgrading from Manywhere Miniblog

Voordat je begint, sommige netwerk opties van b2evolution gaan er vanuit dat j ehet eens bent met onze simpele Algemene Voorwaarden.

As always, it is wise to do a backup of your current website / blog / database (depending on what you already have) before starting to install something new.

Zodra je de b2evolution distributie hebt uitgepakt:

  1. On your server, locate the mysql database you are already using for Manywhere Miniblog. You must use the same database for b2evolution to be able to upgrade. Feel safe, b2evolution will not alter your Miniblog tables and data in any way!

    Opmerking 1: Unless you changed the config, all tables created by b2evolution are prefixed with evo_ . Unless you already have an application using the same prefix, this makes it safe to install b2evolution in a database shared with other applications. For example, Miniblog uses two tables named miniblog and user. Your existing tables will not be affected in any way.
    Opmerking 2: Waarom dezelfde database? Omdat het SQL proces dat we gebruiken om de data te kopieren -- die snel en veilig is -- alleen kan worden gedaan in een enkele database.
  2. Upload de b2evolution bestanden naar je website, die gelijk is aan de URL die je net hebt geconfigureerd.

    Opmerking: Only the contents of the /blogs directory need to be uploaded to your site. If you want b2evolution to handle the homepage of your site, upload the contents of the /blogs folder to your website root. However, you could start by uploading the files to a new subdirectory, /b2evo for example; that way your existing Miniblog remains fully functional while you check out b2evolution.
    Laten we er vanuit gaan dat je de inhoud van de weblogs map hebt geinstalleerd in http://jouwsite.com/b2evo ...
  3. Run the installation script on your server. It is located in http://yoursite.com/b2evo/install . Then, simply follow the on screen instructions.

    The installer will ask you a few questions, create required database tables, copy your Miniblog data to b2evo (without affecting Miniblog) and configure b2evolution for you.
  4. Controleer of de nieuwe installatie werkt.
  5. Op productie servers, is het aangeraden dat je de /install/ directory verwijdert.
  6. Nadat de basis installatie is voltooid, zijn er nog wat tricky dingen waar je rekening mee moet houden (online handboek)
